aircraft.value: Scorpion Assault - AC-6322-613 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic fluid contamination detected. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 13/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 15/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 17/04/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 20/04/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
